articles.title: China and Russia Begin Joint Military Drills in Sea of Japan
articles.description: China and Russia have commenced joint naval exercises in the Sea of Japan, aiming to strengthen their partnership and counterbalance the U.S.-led global order. The drills, named Joint Sea-2025, include submarine rescue, anti-submarine, air defense, and maritime combat operations.

articles.title: Thousands Join Pro-Palestinian March Over Sydney Harbour Bridge
articles.description: Tens of thousands marched across the Sydney Harbour Bridge, demanding recognition of Palestinian statehood and sanctions on Israel. Despite severe weather, the protest remained peaceful with no reported injuries or arrests.

articles.title: OPEC+ Agrees to a Big Output Increase
articles.description: The oil-producing alliance OPEC+ has approved a production hike of 547,000 barrels per day starting in September, reversing recent cuts aimed at regaining global market share amid geopolitical strain.
